sentences.en: Cyrus , that idiot, broke the Vampire's Garment into four elements.
sentences.cn: 塞勒斯这个可恶的家伙, 他把吸血鬼披风分成了4个部分.

sentences.en: Getting hard was the only case for you to turn to a vampire?
sentences.cn: 勃起是使你变成吸血鬼唯一的办法 吗 ?

sentences.en: However Carrie Ng broke Ultimate Vampire a breath moment I still remember.
sentences.cn: 不过,幸有吴家丽破了最凶猛的一次例,看得差点眩晕.

sentences.en: I don't think a vampire any responsibility to anybody.
sentences.cn: 我不认为吸血鬼队任何人有责任.

sentences.en: I used to think the prince is a vampire.
sentences.cn: 我想那个王子是只吸血鬼.

sentences.en: I was a newborn vampire at beauty of the night.
sentences.cn: 我是个新生的吸血鬼,为夜色之美而伤感.

sentences.en: Mr. Vampire: Excuse me. Can you help me please?
sentences.cn: 吸血鬼先生: 对不起, 请问可以帮我一下 吗 ?

sentences.en: Mr. Vampire: Thanks. I want to see where I am.
sentences.cn: 吸血鬼先生: 谢谢, 我想知道自己身在何方.

sentences.en: One of the great things about the vampire tradition is that you make it your own.
sentences.cn: 关于吸血鬼传说最伟大的事情之一就是你可以让它成为你自己的。

sentences.en: Reeva is a vampire who specializes in feeding from young men.
sentences.cn: 瑞伊娃是个专找年轻男子下手的吸血鬼.

sentences.en: We have already sent one of ouranti - vampire experfsto Cheddar Village.
sentences.cn: 我们已经派了一队我们的反吸血鬼专家去了村子.

sentences.en: Who better to promote the virtues of giving blood than a vampire?
sentences.cn: 谁能比吸血鬼更能理解献血的美德 呢 ?

sentences.en: Why do you think do vampire movies have such a success?
sentences.cn: 你认为为什么吸血鬼电影会取得如此大的成功?

sentences.en: Will Elena become a vampire and stay together with Stefan forever?
sentences.cn: 埃琳娜会成为吸血鬼和斯特凡永远在一起 吗 ?

sentences.en: Yes, Edward's human musical ability was enhanced in his vampire life.
sentences.cn: 可以的, 爱德华人类时的音乐才能在吸血鬼生命中就得到了提升.

sentences.en: You made a goddamn vampire Pomeranian?
sentences.cn: 你们创造了一只吸血波美拉尼亚犬?

words.tran_cn: 相信吸血鬼存在的迷信；勒索钱财；勾引

phrases.tran_cn: 吸血蝙蝠；勾引并导致男人毁灭的女人；吮吸膏血者

trans.tran_cn: 吸血鬼，吸血蝙蝠，敲诈勒索者，高利贷者
trans.tran_en: in stories, a dead person that sucks people’s blood by biting their necks
